attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In view of the massive over-manning of the BBC especially at senior management and admin levels, and the excessive salary payments and expenses of same, and the sheer waste of money on BBC3 and BBC4 TV and BBC Radio 6 and Radio 7, that the TV licence fee be reduced by £10 per year until it ceases, thus giving the BBC at least 12 years to find ways of running itself efficiently.
